title: Opt into a Live Activity - game is scheduled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user goes to the score screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with their favorite team
AND 'Track Game' cta

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the score screen, 2 hours and few minutes before the game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user can still opt in a Live Activity
AND star is displayed next to the favorite team
AND 'Track this game in your lock screen' copy is displayed
AND 'Track Game' CTA is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the score screen 2 hours before the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN 'Track Game' cta should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Track Game' cta
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the cta text is updated to 'Tracking' and the cta turns blue

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing their lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with Live Activity card

title: Opt into a Live Activity - game is live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user wants to track the game 
AND the game is currently LIVE
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user can still opt in a Live Activity
AND star is displayed next to the favorite team
AND 'Track this game in your lock screen' copy is displayed
AND 'Track Game' CTA is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user goes to the score screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with their favorite team
AND 'Track Game' cta

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the score screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN 'Track Game' cta should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Track Game' cta
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the cta text is updated to 'Tracking' and the cta turns blue

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing their lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with Live Activity card
AND LA card displays correct score

title: Opt out a Live Activity
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user goes to the score screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the match is marked as 'tracking'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'tracking' cta
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the cta text is updated to 'Track Game' and the cta color is updated to white

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing their lock screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is NOT displayed with a Live Activity card

title: Live Activity display on iPhone 14
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Live Activity on the iPhone 14 Pro and iPhone 14 Pro Max device lockscreen
custom_expected: THEN the match should appear on the Lock screen and also within the Dynamic Island

title: Live Activity landing page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Live Activity
custom_expected: THEN user should be directed to the match's equivalent Game Day landing page

title: Team logos
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing LA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the team logos are displayed correctly
AND the team logos have an outline

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the team logo is missing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN MLB logo is displayed

title: EC - Poor or no connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in 
AND user has Live Activity on
custom_steps: WHEN user has poor or no connection
custom_expected: THEN LA display does not change (no indication of low or no connection) and scores are displayed from last user had connection

title: EC - Time Zone
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a scheduled state
custom_steps: WHEN user changes the time zone
custom_expected: THEN the new time zone is displayed on the LA card for the scheduled game

title: EC - military time display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a scheduled state
custom_steps: WHEN user updates time to military in the phone settings
custom_expected: THEN the time is displayed in 24-hour format and has no AM/PM

title: EC - cancelled, postponed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user does not track the game
AND game is cancelled or postponed
custom_steps: WHEN game has been Cancelled or Postponed
custom_expected: THEN 'Track game' button should NOT be displayed

title: LA Lock Screen - game is SCHEDULED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a scheduled state

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND the game start time with AM/PM is displayed
AND user time zone is displayed

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410447)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND the game start time with AM/PM is displayed
AND user time zone is displayed

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410448)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game starts (when we receive a first update, should happen after the warm-up but before the first throw)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the LA card view changes to live

title: LA Lock Screen - game is LIVE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game is live

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with:

* light Live Activity card
* team logos
* current score underneath team logos
* current inning between team logos
* runner on bases graphic
* ball count and outs

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410451)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* dark Live Activity card
* team logos
* current score underneath team logos
* current inning between team logos
* runner on bases graphic
* ball count and outs

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410452)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game gets final
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the LA card view changes to final

title: LA Lock Screen - game is DELAYED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a delayed state
custom_expected:
Delayed - 
game will be played today
game will not be scheduled again at a later date
game may still transition to a Postponed or Suspended status

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND 'Delayed Start' is displayed between the logos

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410491)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND 'Delayed Start' is displayed between the logos

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410661)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game gets live
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the LA card view changes to live

title: LA Lock Screen - game is LIVE - DELAYED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has started but then got delayed
custom_steps:
Delayed -
game will be played today
game will not be scheduled again at a later date
game may still transition to a Postponed or Suspended status.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with:

* light Live Activity card
* team logos
* current score underneath team logos
* current inning between team logos and 'Delayed' 
* runner on bases graphic
* ball count and outs

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410497)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with:

* dark Live Activity card
* team logos
* current score underneath team logos
* current inning between team logos and 'Delayed' 
* runner on bases graphic
* ball count and outs

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410498)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN game starts again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN game starts from the inning that it got stopped

title: LA Lock Screen - game is POSTPONED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a postponed state
custom_expected:
Postponed
game has not started
game will not be played today
game will be scheduled again at a later date

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND 'Postponed' is displayed between the logos

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410659)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND 'Delayed Start' is displayed between the logos

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410660)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page
Note: the LA card should only be displayed for about 4 hours in this case (iOS functionality)

title: LA Lock Screen - game is SUSPENDED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has started but got suspended
custom_expected:
Suspended
game has started
game will not be played today
game will be scheduled again at a later date

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410667)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND current scores are displayed underneath the team logos
AND current inning and 'Suspended' between team logos
AND runner on bases graphic
AND ball count and outs

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13410668)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the game is rescheduled at a later date
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN it will have a resumed status

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN / IF the game status changes to final
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game will have a final-Early state (separate TC)

title: LA Lock Screen - game is RESUMED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a resumed state
custom_expected:
Resumed (Scheduled / Live / Final)
This is a game that was Suspended on a previous date.

We are treating resumed games as a new game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views the LA card in light mode
AND game has scheduled state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a light background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND game time with the time zone
AND when game starts, it continues from the inning it was stopped on a previous day

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views the LA card in dark mode
AND game has scheduled state
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN LA card has a dark background
AND both team logos are displayed and have an outline
AND game time with the time zone
AND when game starts, it continues from the inning it was stopped on a previous day

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to MLB app score page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN game starts
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the LA card view changes to live
AND it starts from the inning that they stopped

title: Game is final - user does NOT turn the track off - Lock screen (iOS functionality)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game is final

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user does not turn the tracking off
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the LA card is displayed for total of 8 hours and will disappear after 4 hours itself

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN it has been more than 4 hours after the user turned the tracking on
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the LA card is not displayed

title: Game is final - user does NOT turn the track off - Dynamic Island (iOS functionality)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game is final

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN it has been more than 8 hours after the user turned the tracking on
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN by default Dynamic Island activity view will be removed immediately

title: Game is final - user turns the track off - LA card display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game is final

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user turns off the tracking after game is final
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the LA card should NOT be displayed 

Test lock screen and dynamic island

title: Dynamic Island “Compact” layout - game is SCHEDULED
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user is using iPhone 14 or 14+
AND user has Live Activity on
AND game has a scheduled state

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing the  Dynamic Island for scheduled game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Dynamic Island displays the team logo with an outline 
AND no scores next to the team logos

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the Dynamic Island 'compact' layout
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Dynamic Island “Expanded” layout is displayed
AND the layout matches the LA lock Screen - game is SCHEDULED test case

title: Spanish
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
AND user's device language is set to spanish

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user goes to Score page in MLB app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the tracking cta and coach mark are displayed in spanish 

AND Track Game CTA should be Rastrea
AND Tracking Game CTA should be Rastreando
ANd The copy translation should be: 
Sigue este juego en tu pantalla bloqueada

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the lock screen
